Uses of Interface
org.ingatan.component.answerfield.IAnswerField

Packages that use IAnswerField
org.ingatan.component.answerfield Default answer fields, and the answer field inteface IAnswerField. 
 

Uses of IAnswerField in org.ingatan.component.answerfield
 

Classes in org.ingatan.component.answerfield that implement IAnswerField
 class AnsFieldEmbeddedAudio
          Answer field that allows the user to embed OGG format audio into questions.
 class AnsFieldHint
           
 class AnsFieldLabelPicture
          Answer field that allows the user to specify a picture and label points on the picture.
 class AnsFieldList
          BasicTextField answer field.
 class AnsFieldMultiChoice
          A multiple choice style answer field that supports rich text for each possible selection, from 2 to 10 possible answers, and a graded marking scheme if desired.
 class AnsFieldSelfGraded
          Free form answer field which provides just a rich text area and the ability to set the maximum number of marks that can be awarded.
 class AnsFieldSimpleMultiChoice
          A multiple choice style answer field that is more simple than the Rich Text multiple choice answer field.
 class AnsFieldSimpleText
          BasicTextField answer field.
 class AnsFieldTrueFalse
          Answer field which, in edit time, allows the user to set the number of marks to award, and whether true or false is correct.
